apple_vendor_description: This representation of a couple on Apple devices showcases two men, one with a medium skin tone and the other with a light skin tone, connected by a luminous red heart that glows with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D effect. The smooth gradients and soft, rounded forms of the figures, along with the heart, suggest tenderness and a strong romantic bond, all rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting. It's a beautiful and inclusive symbol of love and partnership for users communicating on Apple devices.
